nodes.bodyText:
There is already a "main" validator: org.eevolution.model.LiberoValidator and it also registers a model intetrceptor: org.eevolution.model.validator.PP_Product_BOM.
you can register the (field-)callout and the tabCallout in its constructor (Services.get(ITabCalloutFactory.class))
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+-- 2020-04-10T12:13:58.823Z
+-- I forgot to set the DICTIONARY_ID_COMMENTS System Configurator
+INSERT INTO AD_ModelValidator (AD_Client_ID,AD_ModelValidator_ID,AD_Org_ID,Created,CreatedBy,EntityType,IsActive,ModelValidationClass,Name,SeqNo,Updated,UpdatedBy) VALUES (0,540124,0,TO_TIMESTAMP('2020-04-10 15:13:58','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),100,'EE01','Y','org.eevolution.callout.PP_Product_BomModuleActivator','Module Activator for PP_Product_Bom',0,TO_TIMESTAMP('2020-04-10 15:13:58','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),100)

nodes.bodyText:
what i meant to say in #6472 (review) is:

please ditch this class (PP_Product_BomModuleInterceptor)
register the new callout and the new tab-callout in the constructor of the existing model interceptor org.eevolution.model.validator.PP_Product_BOM

+
+public class PP_Product_BomModuleInterceptor extends AbstractModuleInterceptor
